title: Simulation-Based Information Literacy Enhancement Course for Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: VR simulation-based learning for mid-level professionals (medical/legal/technical), emphasizing workplace application in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can identify credible information sources in the science domain with 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze three or more elements of information bias in VR simulation environments.
Learners can design an information evaluation framework applicable to real-world work scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
